label: PresenceDetector
description: It converts WiFi reading to a person’s presence in region level

label: EnlightedSmartSensor
description: Indoor motion detecting devices used to detect the presence of a person to automatically control lights or temperature or ventilation systems

label: Thermometer
description: Device that measures temperature or a temperature gradient

label: Beacon
description: A beacon is a small Bluetooth radio transmitter, powered by batteries

label: Camera
description: Wireless security cameras are closed-circuit television (CCTV) cameras that transmit a video and audio signal to a wireless receiver through a radio band.

label: WiFiAP
description: AP connects directly to a wired local area network, typically Ethernet, and the AP then provides wireless connections using wireless LAN technology, typically Wi-Fi, for other devices to utilize that wired connection

label: OccupancyCalculator
description: It converts WiFi readings to a space’s occupancy

label: Smartphone WiFi
description: A handheld personal computer with a mobile operating system and an integrated mobile broadband cellular network connection for voice, SMS, and Internet data communication

label: HVAC Variable Air Volume Box
description: Variable air volume (VAV) is a type of heating, ventilating, and/or air-conditioning (HVAC) system. VAV systems vary the airflow at a constant temperature.
